Verses: 1 sagodharare Ivaigal Nadakkunkaalangalaiyum Samayangalaiyunguriththu Ungalukku Ezhudhavenduvadhillai.
2 iravile Thirudan Varugiravidhamaaik Karththarudaiya Naal Varumendru Neengale Nandraai Arindhirukkireergal.
3 samaadhaanamum Savukkiyamum Undendru Avargal Sollumpodhu, Karppavadhiyaanavalukku Vedhanai Varugiradhupola, Azhivu Sadidhiyaai Avargalmel Varum; Avargal Thappippovadhillai.
4 sagodharare, Andha Naal Thirudanaippola Ungalaip Pidiththukkollaththakkadhaaga Neengal Andhagaaraththilirukkiravargalallave.
5 neengalellaarum Velichchaththin Pillaigalum, Pagalin Pillaigalumaayirukkireergal; Naam Iravukkum Irulukkum Ullaanavargalallave.
6 aagaiyaal, Matravargal Thoongugiradhupola Naam Thoongaamal, Vizhiththukkondu Thelindhavargalaayirukkakkadavom.
7 thoongugiravargal Raaththiriyile Thoonguvaargal; Verikollugiravargal Raaththiriyile Verikolluvaargal.
8 pagalukkuriyavargalaagiya Naamo Thelindhavargalaayirundhu, Visuvaasam Anbu Ennum Maarkkavasaththaiyum, Ratchippin Nambikkaiyennum Thalaichcheeraavaiyum Thariththukkondirukkakkadavom.
9 dhevan Nammaik Kobaakkinaikkendru Niyamikkaamal, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiyayesukiristhumoolamaai Ratchippadaivadharkendru Niyamiththaar.
10 naam Vizhiththiruppavargalaanaalum Niththiraiyadaindhavargalaanaalum, Thammudanekooda Naam Egamaaip Pizhaiththirukkumpadi Avar Namakkaaga Mariththaare.
11 aagaiyaal Neengal Seydhuvarugirapadiye, Oruvaraiyoruvar Thetri, Oruvarukkoruvar Bakdhiviruththi Undaagumpadi Seyyungal.
12 andriyum, Sagodharare, Ungalukkulle Pirayaasappattu, Karththarukkul Ungalai Visaaranaiseygiravargalaayirundhu, Ungalukkup Buththisollugiravargalai Neengal Madhiththu,
13 avargaludaiya Kiriyaiyinimiththam Avargalai Migavum Anbaai Ennikkollumpadi Ungalai Vendikkollugirom. Ungalukkulle Samaadhaanamaayirungal.

14 melum, Sagodharare, Naangal Ungalukkup Podhikkiradhennavendraal, Ozhungillaadhavargalukkup Buththisollungal, Thidanatravargalaith Thetrungal, Balaveenaraith Thaangungal, Ellaaridaththilum Neediya Saandhamaayirungal.
15 oruvanum Matroruvan Seyyum Theemaikkuth Theemaiseyyaadhapadi Paarungal; Ungalukkullum Matra Yaavarukkullum Eppozhudhum Nanmaiseyya Naadungal.
16 eppozhudhum Sandhoshamaayirungal.
17 idaividaamal Jebampannungal.
18 ellaavatrileyum Sthoththiranseyyungal; Appadi Seyvadhe Kiristhu Yesuvukkul Ungalaikkuriththuth Dhevanudaiya Siththamaayirukkiradhu.
19 aaviyai Aviththuppodaadhirungal.
20 theerkkadharisanangalai Arpamaayennaadhirungal.
21 ellaavatraiyum Sodhiththuppaarththu, Nalamaanadhaip Pidiththukkollungal.
22 pollaangaaith Thondrugira Ellaavatraiyum Vittu Vilagungal.

23 samaadhaanaththin Dhevan Thaame Ungalai Mutrilum Parisuththamaakkuvaaraaga, Ungal Aavi Aaththumaa Sareerammuzhuvadhum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Varumbodhu Kutramatradhaayirukkumpadi Kaakkappaduvadhaaga.
24 ungalai Azhaikkiravar Unmaiyullavar, Avar Appadiye Seyvaar.
25 sagodharare, Engalukkaaga Vendikkollungal.
26 sagodhararellaaraiyum Parisuththa Muththaththode Vaazhththungal.
27 indha Nirubam Parisuththamaana Sagodharar Yaavarukkum Vaasikkappadumpadi Seyyavendumendrukarththarperil Aanaiyittu Ungalukku Sollugiren.
28 nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungaludanekooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
